header.title: Omni Max
header.subtitle: Much more than an extension
header.enable_tooltip: Enable/Disable the entire Omni Max extension
header.repo_tooltip: View Omni Max repository on GitHub

personas.title: Persona Management
personas.description_placeholder: Ex: Specialist in advanced technical issues.
personas.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete the persona "{name}"?
personas.validation_error: Persona name and prompt cannot be empty.
personas.no_personas_yet: No personas created yet. Click below to add one.

placeholders.enable_extension_for_shortcuts: Enable the extension to configure shortcuts.
placeholders.enable_extension_for_ai: Enable the extension to use AI.
placeholders.enable_ai_for_prompts: Prompts available when extension and AI features are enabled.
placeholders.no_prompts_available: No prompt configurations available for active AI features.
placeholders.add_credentials_to_list_models: To list models, add credentials in the modal below and save.

modal.no_credentials_needed: This provider doesn't require additional credentials.

alerts.ai_config_error: AI configuration error: {error}. Please correct before saving.
alerts.ai_config_incomplete: Incomplete AI configuration: Please select an AI model.

ai.load_failed_generic: Failed to load models. Check credentials and provider access.
ai.no_models_found_provider: No models found for this provider. Check URL (Ollama) or if models are available.

layout_correction.name: Layout Correction
layout_correction.description: Moves the conversation list to the right and limits the height for better usability.

template_processor.name: Template Processor
template_processor.description: Adjusts customer name ({NAME} => Name) and auto-selects variables ([VAR]) with Tab.

shortcut_copy_name.name: Shortcut: Copy Customer Name
shortcut_copy_name.label: Customer Name
shortcut_copy_name.description: Allows copying the customer's name using a keyboard shortcut.

shortcut_copy_document_number.name: Shortcut: Copy Customer Document
shortcut_copy_document_number.label: Document Number
shortcut_copy_document_number.description: Allows copying the customer's document number using a keyboard shortcut.

shortcut_service_order_template.name: Shortcut: Service Order Template
shortcut_service_order_template.label: Service Order Template
shortcut_service_order_template.description: Copies a Service Order template with pre-filled Phone and Protocol.

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.description: Configure AI features to improve service efficiency.

ai_assistant.name: AI: Chat Assistant
ai_assistant.description: Opens a popup with an AI assistant to help with contextual tasks during service.

prompts.title: Customizable Prompts
prompts.description: Customize the prompts used by AI features to better meet your needs.

summary_prompt.label: Conversation Summary Prompt
summary_prompt.placeholder: Ex: Summarize this conversation concisely, focusing on the customer's main issue and the solution offered.
summary_prompt.default: Summarize this customer service conversation concisely, highlighting the main problem, primary cause, and resolution.

improvement_prompt.label: Response Improvement Prompt
improvement_prompt.placeholder: Ex: Review the following response to a customer, making it clearer, more empathetic, and professional.
improvement_prompt.default: Review the following response to a customer, making it clearer, more empathetic, and professional, while maintaining the original meaning:

summary_button.label: Summarize
summary_button.context_error_alert: Omni Max: Could not identify active conversation to summarize.

ai_context.preamble_segments: This protocol includes multiple merged service segments (IDs: {ids}).

alerts.document_not_found: Customer document not found on page.
alerts.customer_name_not_found: Customer name not found on page.

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.choose_or_type: Choose a suggestion or type your question

suggestions.summarize_desc: Get the main points of the conversation
suggestions.summarize_prompt_text: Summarize this customer service conversation concisely, highlighting the main problem, primary cause, and resolution.
